head.title: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: xsl:next-match

meta.name: title
meta.content: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: xsl:next-match

body.p: The xsl:next-match instruction is very similar to xsl:apply-imports, but with a different algorithm for choosing the next template to execute. It chooses the template rule that matches the current node and that would have been chosen if the current template rule and all higher precedence/priority rules were not there.
